title: Ennakaaga Unnakaaga Lyrics Kadhal 2 Kalyanam Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Naresh Iyer, Andrea
Lyrics: Pa Vijay
Songs: Ennakaaga Unnakaaga
Movie: Kadhal 2 Kalyanam

Ennakaaga, Unnakaaga, vennilavin saalaigal
indha nimishathile, indha nodigalile kidyaathe ellaigal
Manasuku kudai neetadhe, kanavuku suvar podathe
Iravuku bayam agagathe oh ohhh..
Nee kavalaigal vittu veliye vaa
pani kulirinil ninaivom vaa
Nilavuku thunai irupoam vaa

Netrenbadhu poyaachu, nalaigalum kaatrachu
Indrenbathu nam kaiyil, ippothe sernthachu
Netrenbadhu poyaachu, nalaigalum kaatrachu
Indrenbathu nam kaiyil, ippothe sernthachu

Unnai ennodu,oru megamaai, oru vaasamai,
oru nesamai kondu pogiren
nagaram nam kayil,naduchalayil vizhayadalam
Kadaloramaai konjam thoongalam

Indha indha nimidamaaga, boomi nindru poga
neyum naanum mattum vazhum iravodu irupom
enna enna sogam, innum innum enna aagum
poga poga kaalam maarum
nalaiku enendru nalaiku naam parkalam

Netrenbadhu poyaachu, nalaigalum kaatrachu
Indrenbathu nam kaiyil, ippothe sernthachu
Everythings gonna be ok,Everythings gonna be alright
Everythings gonna be ok,Everythings gonna be alright

Ohhh. yaarum illadha, indha salaigal andha vizhakugal
indha padagugal namakagave
nee naan ondraga, oru mathiri ,indha raathiri
ada chi chi chi bappapa re

yaarum illai enbadhaga, nanum ingu ninru poga
kooda vandhu thozhil saaya neethane irunthaai
Thalli podum prenchanaigal, meendum vandhu thottu parrkkum
Muttru pulli vaithu povom, nagam thannai narukiya
Viralonrum edhiri illai

Everythings gonna be ok,Everythings gonna be alright
Everythings gonna be ok and i am gonna be alright
Everythings gonna be ok,Everythings gonna be alright
Everythings gonna be ok and i am gonna be alright

seo.description: Get the complete Ennakaaga Unnakaaga Lyrics Kadhal 2 Kalyanam Song Lyrics from Kadhal 2 Kalyanam. Read the lyrics penned by Pa Vijay and composed by Yuvan and sung by Andrea Jeremiah. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Pa Vijay, Kadhal 2 Kalyanam, Yuvan, Andrea Jeremiah, Naresh Iyer, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
